special_attacks: smite evil 1/day (+2 attack and AC, +1 damage)
other_gear: banded mail, heavy wooden shield, dagger, longsword, locked gauntlet, silver holy symbol, 33 gp

sections.body: During Combat The paladin begins with Dazzling Display, then uses smite evil on the strongest evil opponent. If he is confident he will win the battle, he continues to demoralize opponents.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The callous rake is a young paladin exhibiting unpaladinlike behavior. If unchecked, these habits become the first step toward disgrace.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Paladin/Paladins/Callous Rake/Tristram Reis

sections.body: Tall, lean, and exceedingly handsome, Tristram Reis is the vision of a true and noble paladin—until he opens his mouth. The son of a lesser noble, he has faith in the goddess of valor, but is a bit arrogant and enamored with his own status as a holy warrior.

sections.name: Tristram Reis

name: Callous Rake
